data.title: 20 million people are starving and the media only cares about Trump says UN

Almost one million families to be hit by Theresa May's plan to end free school lunches, think tank warns - The Prime Minister has been branded "the lunch snatcher" over plans which the Education Policy Institute claims could cost hard-working families up to £440 a year
In his Riyadh speech, President Trump described Islam as "one of the world’s great faiths"
Saudis And The UAE Will Donate $100 Million To A Fund Inspired By Ivanka Trump
Former Trump campaign adviser has been asked to testify before the House intelligence committee over accusations of Russian meddling in the 2016 election
South African men march against abuse of women and children
Australia cuts environmental controls and promises $1 billion to assist a coal mine affecting vulnerable species and the already terminal Great Barrier Reef
Fuming Netanyahu orders ministers to attend Trump's reception after most refuse to show up
Ebay accused of failing its sellers as fraudulent buyers manipulate the system

British Prime Minister Theresa May's lead in the opinion polls has narrowed after her Conservatives and the Labour opposition published their policy plans this week, with one survey showing the gap between the two parties halving to nine points.
